text:
Hi!
 We're in the process of developing an app for HubSpot, but we've run into an issue during moderation. The moderator isn't able to access our links for the Setup Guide, Privacy Policy, and Terms of Service, though they work perfectly on our end (<https://callscriptprompter.com/integration-HubSpot>, <https://callscriptprompter.com/agreement>, <https://callscriptprompter.com/offer>).
<https://zmdownload.zoho.eu/zm/ImageDisplay?na=5050657000000002002&nmsgId=1718977894154030001&f=2.png&mode=inline&cid=577c8f4e5671b052044bc950930fe137&|Error accessing the link>
 All links are public, tested with accessibility tools, and the site is proxied through Cloudflare.
Has anyone else faced a similar issue? Any suggestions on resolving this?
